website_summaries.verdict: The Mandrill 4-piece kit has everything you need for hand and arm strengthening.
pros: Industrial hand strengthener with resistance from 22 to 88 pounds
Suitable for hands of all sizes
Includes apparatus for finger exercise and a carrying case
3-year warranty and 100% dedication to customer satisfaction
cons: Plastic parts may not hold up as well over time as metal strengtheners
Finger stretcher can break easily in some kits

customer_reviews.title: You Get What You Pay For
customer_reviews.text: Overall, I'm satisfied with most of the tools included. Though the quality of some of the items were very poor. The plastic on the finger exerciser started cracking on the second day, and the finger stretcher snapped after one use, and gave me a pretty decent lash on my arm. The hand strengthener is my favorite out of the bunch. It seems very sturdy and has a lot of resistance.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Great buy for the money!!!
customer_reviews.text: This contained everything I was looking for. While I am no fitness expert, I did notice less strength in my fingers and grip, as I’m getting older. This package contained everything i needed, in one package. The hand grip has an adjustable tension, from super easy to a tight firm grip. The finger strengthened also helps with my grip. There’s a band thing that helps stretch out my fingers, so that’s fun. And lastly, the circle stress donut, helps me deal with my out of control boss.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product because i just started to practice CrossFit and I'm looking to improve my hand grip. I am very surprised to notice that my grip is improving very fast and the products are very useful. I was able to feel the muscles working from the first exercises I performed. The quality of this kit is very good and the exercises from the eBook are very practical and bring great value to the product. This hand strengthener kit looks great, feels great and I would definitely recommend it to my gym CrossFit friends without a doubt.
customer_reviews.author: Loredana

customer_reviews.title: More bang for your buck!
customer_reviews.text: Went to a sports equipment store and one hand gripper alone was $20. With this one you get 4 different items PLUS a super cute bag to keep everything in. The items aren’t cheatply made and everything was/is in working condition. Great products!
customer_reviews.author: EMH

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Kit For Strengthening Your Grip
customer_reviews.text: Reason for purchase: I bought these to help with my OCR training. Packaging: Included everything in the images with each being individually wrapped in an OPP bag to protect them. Item arrived with no damage to anything inside. All pieces fits nicely into the included carrying pouch. Product Use: After a few quick workouts I can say I am impressed with the quality and easy of use for all the pieces. I wish the finger exerciser had slightly more resistance, but that's just my own personal preference. Pros: - Quality materials - Included carrying pouch - 3 year warranty - Downloadable .pdf for lots of exercise ideas Cons: - None
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy, cheap knockoffs
customer_reviews.text: This is so sketchy. This item does not match the product photos. Even the plastic packaging isn’t the same. There isn’t a logo on the products; they look like cheap knockoffs, might have been used before, but bought it new. :(((
customer_reviews.author: C. L.

customer_reviews.title: just like they wanted me to use in Physical therapy
customer_reviews.text: helped heal my very infected finger with nerve damage. just like they wanted me to use in Physical therapy. I purchased this and saved the co pays used it more than I would have just going to P/T/ 2times a week costing me money / thus healing 6 months ahead of time. Check with your doctors , my doctors are thrilled.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Pierson

customer_reviews.title: Nice set of hand exercisers
customer_reviews.text: Nice set, comes with a storage bag too. Most of the other similar sets (they all look like they come from the same plant in China) also include a ball but that function is probably covered with the included Ines. The adjustable feature on the gripper thing is nice, using it to recover from a tennis elbow injury.
customer_reviews.author: John W. Reeder

customer_reviews.title: Do not waste your time or money.
customer_reviews.text: Was not the same product. It came with the same type of items but none of them were the brand advertised. The adjustable grip wasn't the same resistances. The individual finger strengthener has the feel of a $1 kids toy. This was a complete sham.
customer_reviews.author: Miranda Nichols

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for early onset of Arthritis
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I needed to strengthen my left hand... Was recently diagnosed with early arthritis in my left hand (2 fingers), also have tennis elbow so I needed something to start exercising my left hand, fingers and wrist. Originally I was only looking for an old school type hand grip strengthener (like my Dad had back in the day) and I found the Hand Grip Strengthener Workout (4-pack) and decided to purchase. This is perfect for strengthening my fingers, had and wrist, brought it into the office and all of the guys were interested in trying them out... I
customer_reviews.author: Shabali D

customer_reviews.title: Not the greatest.  Prefer full metal grip trainers.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item just a week or so ago and the rubber band finger band broke under little tension. The grip trainer with dial is wearing incredibly fast. This happens when you put a metal pin to fasten a plastic handle. I suspect it will break in a couple weeks as I am using it daily. The spring finger trainer is also pretty week. My recommendation would be to look elsewhere if you have a medium to strong grip already. This wont do much for you and youll just shred it. Will work fine for light duty and weak grip users.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua G

customer_reviews.title: Trained Spiders for Hands!
customer_reviews.text: I didn't expect much for the price, but these have become a staple of my existence, they've helped my guitar playing a lot by making my pinky less of a wet shrimp hanging off the end of my hand and more into something I can use, and they have made working on cars a lot easier also, threading stubborn bolts and fishing wires through small spaces etc is dramatically easier with the improved finger strength. Just, buy these, I have been very pleased with them in the couple months I have owned them. You're working from home anyway, what else are you doing while you wait for the work computer to load?
customer_reviews.author: Zebra Hoedown Throwdown

customer_reviews.title: Classy deal
customer_reviews.text: Best buy on a cool assortment of hand strengthening gear. So much for so little? All attractively packaged and all now a part of my workout routine. Wish everything was as simply done right as this stuff and no, I didn't get it for free or am some kind of sales gimmick. Every once in a while, you get a really nice package and it's a simple pleasure to share that info with others.
customer_reviews.author: Ainsley Hanes

customer_reviews.title: Guaranteed quality?..
customer_reviews.text: So I received it today and have had it for about 7 and a half minutes and this thing broke hahaha
customer_reviews.author: Lebron

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this because I’m starting to have some carpal tunnel issues and I was trying to strengthen my hand grip and wrist strength to prevent any further weakness problems. It feels great after using the adjustable grip strength it seemed to take the pain out of my fingers after using it for a little bit. The donut ring had some good resistance to it and can easily fit in your pocket for trave use. Overall a great purchase for my needs and my strength is already returning.
customer_reviews.author: Jason F

customer_reviews.title: Not the best quality, but it's cheap so can't complain too much.
customer_reviews.text: One piece of this kit broke less than a week after I received. My hands are not super jacked or anything, so I don't think I'm some herculean example of hand opening strength. The individual finger squeezing thing also doesn't have the smoothest movement. However, it's a decently large kit for a relatively low price so still gets a decent score.
customer_reviews.author: Karte

customer_reviews.title: Too difficult
customer_reviews.text: The resistance of the black band and black finger grip strength is too difficult. This should be used for individuals that aren't injured. Not ideal for rehabilitation or good for hands that do normal work with average strength. The items are too stiff and can cause injury if you attempt to use. I returned this item.
customer_reviews.author: Honey Flower

customer_reviews.title: Worthless and Weak
customer_reviews.text: Cheap - none of these products are going to make a difference for an adult with normal hands. Maybe a young child could get stronger hands using this stuff but it doesn't offer enough resistance to help me at all even when I set the hand grip to the maximum of 40 KG. Lame. Sending back.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Hill

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I just broke my left wrist one month ago and needed to rebuild strength immediately so I bought this. These products are well made, work great and I would definitely recommend to everyone. Only been using less than 30 minutes and my wrist and forearm are feeling better already!
customer_reviews.author: Darius Phiffer

customer_reviews.title: IMPRESSED
customer_reviews.text: I have to say that I was surprised and impressed with what I received. The packaging is 1st rate and the different items are of very good quality. I have to say that for the money, this is Top Shelf. All I can testify to is that this set surprised me very much so I bought one for my Grandson. I really like the finger band ( increases the outward strength of your hand ) I was impressed with the material that was used, very durable. I of course bought 2 of them.
customer_reviews.author: Just a Normal Person

customer_reviews.title: Excellent.
customer_reviews.text: The circle and the big adjustable hand grip are all you really need in the package. The other two products aren't really needed. The one with the multiple springs is too weak for anything. The finger looped one is just plain annoying. The adjustable hand grip goes from a lightweight grip to something you'd only be able to move if you lift heavy. A definite recommendation for getting grip/finger strength for shooting
customer_reviews.author: Earthchild

customer_reviews.title: Solid for the price
customer_reviews.text: I didn't like the finger stretcher resistance band. It's too much work to get your fingers in that hole. Probably better just using a thick rubber band. The other tools seem fine. Oddly, the grip ring seems to be my favorite thing to just mess with while i'm working. Use it like a high powered stress ball.
customer_reviews.author: Deiket Desse

customer_reviews.title: Decent for the price.
customer_reviews.text: As a number of other reviewers have mentioned, the quality of the extension band is questionable, however my main issue with the primary product I bought this set for is that the spring loaded hand grip strengthener has a grip that is very abrasive, and even after a few squeezes makes your fingers feel like they are going to blister. In addition the highest setting, supposedly 40 kg, can't be anywhere near that difficulty. I ended up putting a sticky note around the handle to prevent blisters. The original "slick" handle that I had on my prior grip strengthener was definitely more comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: brewl

customer_reviews.title: I always carry around my grippy bois
customer_reviews.text: When you get really into weight lifting you end up having to carry hundreds of pounds of weights and sometimes your grip just doesn't feel like enough. I needed a way to increase that grip strength and grow some dad-forearms and ever since I purchased this set I always have at least one of the tools in my pocket or in my car helping me focus by giving my hands something to do. After just a couple of weeks I am already noticing a difference in my grip strength and I can't wait to see how far I can take it
customer_reviews.author: Ethan Oyakhilome

customer_reviews.title: The hand Gripper review
customer_reviews.text: At first I wasn't very sure, but as you continue to increase the hand gripper tension, this quickly becomes the idea addition to my training routine. If you are looking to increase your hands and forearm strength, this is a good affordable choice. I am doing 250 reps per hand per day. The gripper allows me to increase the tension weekly. Major gains noticeable. Great value.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Morrison

customer_reviews.title: Partially useful
customer_reviews.text: Only the two hand grippers are useful to me. The circle an 5 finger device are too small for the average man. So, overall only two of the four items are useful. These types of products if NOT one size fits all. Choose wisely, look for size or info regarding diameter and other tell tail indicators before selecting these types of products if you are looking for serious help for your hand problems.
customer_reviews.author: sarge 9489

customer_reviews.title: Packaging was easy to open and whole no tears or opened bags
customer_reviews.text: Packaging was easy to open and whole no tears or opened bags. Each item was bagged separately inside and clean. Tools work just as described. After having a fairly serious injury that prevented climbing and hiking including the fracturing of my hand in multiple places i realized I had lost a lot of my grip strength. I've been using these for a few days now and they are easy to use and the larger tool is adjustable for weight use. I would suggest it highly for anyone who wants to build up or maintain strength.
customer_reviews.author: Cat

customer_reviews.title: Good for the money.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for the grip strengthener even though it cam with the rest of the stuff. The grip thing works great and I like the adjustable spring. The finger strengthener works good also and I use it. The only issue with it is that it has sharp edges from the mold. I took some sandpaper to it and smoothed it out so it no longer bites into my thumb. The other two items are pretty much usless
customer_reviews.author: A. Austin

customer_reviews.title: Best Hand Exerciser Ever !!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product / group of products for everything in hand exercise. Very well made. Instant adjust with a knob, no changing springs. This can be adjusted so hard I can't squeeze it, so there's plenty of room for growth and improvement in strength. Comes with an exerciser that works each finger individually. Also has an exerciser for outward finger inflection. Comes in a very nice carrying bag. Top Notch Product. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis P.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect grip therapy and strength exercise
customer_reviews.text: Several years back I had an accident and lost a lot of dexterity in my right hand. And most of my grip. My little finger and ring finger along with my thumb is my grip a three finger grip.. My index finger and middle finger had atrophied due to partial amputation and Trauma. These adjustable hand grip exercisers are just right. Easy to increase or decrease resistance. now I can work my damaged hand in increments adjusting as needed. This is definitely a better mousetrap.
customer_reviews.author: DJS

customer_reviews.title: Good buy you get what they show
customer_reviews.text: Bought after breaking my wrist to rebuild strength so far i can barly use the round one and the standered grip one i can not use the stretchy one at all in ether hand to week i guess lol but its a good produckt and the one for each finger (i have no idea what these things are called) any ways i find my pinky has no strength to move any of these things on that one on ether hand i am realy week i guess good buy though
customer_reviews.author: Bevedawn

customer_reviews.title: Nice Variety and working well!
customer_reviews.text: I got this kit because it had other hand strengtheners as opposed to just the coil squeeze one. I really like the pack it came well packaged and everything is holding up to daily use. I especially love the little ring one and its easy on my joints. I am noticing improvement and am really happy with how well everything feels material wise.
customer_reviews.author: CorbettTop Contributor: Pokémon

customer_reviews.title: Nice but cheaply built
customer_reviews.text: Everything works and the little baggie is a nice touch. My only complaint is that the squeeze device, the one with the adjustable strength, seems to be destroying itself at the hinge. Every squeeze causes a tiny bit of plastic to be shaved off of the fulcrum. My desk is now covered in tiny black plastic scraps. Nothing has fallen apart but the two plastic objects feel cheaply made.
customer_reviews.author: Simon

customer_reviews.title: hand strengtheners
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to help make hands a little stronger and flexible. Most items are used and very great. But I really don't like the finger one For one im scared it will break on me since it feels super weak. Then there's the distance It just isn't comfortable the way the holes are positioned. Love that it comes with its own little bag though
customer_reviews.author: Lourdes Guzman

customer_reviews.title: Great Strengthening tool!
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I recently started working out together at home with our children. My wife was involved in a terrible car accident some years ago that left her partially paralyzed on her right side. Our trainer recommended these tools to help her strengthen her hands. They have been a "Blessing". She is getting stronger and I use them as well. Great product and packaged very well.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Stafford

customer_reviews.title: Good hand exerciser
customer_reviews.text: My hands are getting weaker and weaker as I age so I decided to try this set. It seems sturdy and I like the carrying bag that comes with it so I don't lose pieces. Time will tell if it works.
customer_reviews.author: Retrogrl

customer_reviews.title: Main Piece Broken
customer_reviews.text: So the main part of the product, which was what I was most excited for, it being the reason why I bought this particular product, seems to broken. It won’t tighten up or loosen when being turned to do so. Well as they say you get what you pay for, atleast I’m left with the donut workout and also the finger workout, but seems I’m left to buy another product elsewhere for the actual item I wanted
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just OK
customer_reviews.text: A little more elementary than I was hoping for. Well Made. However, eventually Max resistance is not enough for a burn in the forearms. Took about two months before I stopped using. Fairly cheap tho, and good starter set, but not for someone serious about forearm strength.
customer_reviews.author: Giles R. Madruga III

customer_reviews.title: It's great for hand strengthening, no seriously
customer_reviews.text: I bought a set a while ago for myself to help with my grip for strongman exercises. I was barely able to hold an axel bar but now I almost don't need straps at all. It also helps you understand which hand is stronger than the other and how much work you need to even them out. I bought my dad a set and he's a weight lifter and he loves this set. He likes that there are options in the set for strengthening because these items weren't around when he was younger.
customer_reviews.author: Laria Martinez-DeLeon

customer_reviews.title: Overall it's a very good deal, you won't regret it !!! Top gear for your hands !
customer_reviews.text: Great service from this company. The combo itself it's great and well built. I was originally looking for the elastic bands which come in 5 around $10 but found this combo much better including not only one tough elastic band but also the hand griper and grip ring which are also very well built. Overall it's a very good deal, you won't regret it !!!
customer_reviews.author: Jose Murillo Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Great tools for a great price
customer_reviews.text: I've only had the kit for a few days, but so far everything is working great. It's a great price for the items you get. I keep them in my car and use them on my commute. There are a lot of studies about the correlation between grip strength and longevity as we age, so I am happy to have found this kit at such a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Jamesville Dad

customer_reviews.title: Kung fu grip
customer_reviews.text: I got this awesome little set with a convenient bag to teach Jeff a lesson, he wont be saying I have a weak handshake anymore. Everything seems to be a good material whereas I don't feel like I can break anything on accident. The only issue I have with it is the adjustable gripper has a clicking noise most of the times it's used.
customer_reviews.author: Codey G.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Quality and Diversity
customer_reviews.text: I’ve seen other Products on Amazon with just one of these items but at the same price, so when I saw this I was astounded and immediately opened the page. it turns out that I was right not to buy the other products, because not only are these adorable, but they also have different strengths and different uses for different types of trainings. These are overall really good and I use them whenever I am about practicing piano or when I am bored.
customer_reviews.author: Connor

customer_reviews.title: Love everything, impressed.
customer_reviews.text: I didn't expect to get great stuff coming in a combo pack like this but I'm happily surprised by the solid quality of all the tools. The only one which gave me a little trouble was the individual finger gripper; just one finger spring was tight at the bottom but a dab of WD-40 lubed it up real good. I've very happy
customer_reviews.author: Austin Bozeman

customer_reviews.title: Something you should have
customer_reviews.text: Everything you need for strengthening and increasing dexterity in your hands. Great all in one kit, from grip strength to finger strength this kit has it. Great for guitar players looking for more finger dexterity. Lacking a firm hand shake? Boom no more, get your grip strength on
customer_reviews.author: Salvatore Benne

customer_reviews.title: Really high quality. great buy
customer_reviews.text: Great value for the money, every tool works great. I usually keep one at work and the other at the home office. helps break up the continuous typing and gets the blood flow in the whole hand and forearm. The other spring grip.. the one for each finger, is a great warm up tool for any musician.
customer_reviews.author: Gage Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Kit
customer_reviews.text: Contains four devices for strengthening hands and fingers. Very good quality and nicely designed. Very easy to use each of the tools included. Covers just about every exercise and device needed to build up power and flexibility in the hands. Nice and compact making it easy to carry around.
customer_reviews.author: Steelman

customer_reviews.title: SHAKE MY HAND!
customer_reviews.text: it just works It looks cheap the price especially for what you get but its all very good quality and even though its all plastic and rubber and you think "hey let me crank up the resistance and wait for it snap and break in my hand" and it doesn't you just sit there amazed I now give the best handshakes THE BEST HANDSHAKES
customer_reviews.author: Carson K.

customer_reviews.title: Hand strengthening package x 4
customer_reviews.text: Haven't had these too long. Unable to talk about durability. I would rate them 4.5 stars. Everything is very clean, arrived quickly. Would be 5 stars if they had a simple book for exercises for people who aren't skilled or knowledgeable regarding exercise routines. Would highly recommend the product.
customer_reviews.author: Don Hoover

customer_reviews.title: Fun, effective, great value
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been frequently using these hand strengtheners for about half a year, and I can definitely feel my grip getting stronger! This is a great product for the price, giving you multiple pieces of equipment to work on your strength that would cost a boatload more if bought separately. The only downside for me looks like it’s effected a lot of people: the rubber stretcher-band thingy snapped after a while. While I was disappointed, I got in touch with the customer service and they were very responsive, sending me a whole new kit because I was still under warranty. I’m hoping the band lasts longer this time. All in all, great bang for the buck!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew B.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I was in a motorcycle accident little over two years ago. I’ve had a lot of injury’s to my body. My hands and wrist are not nearly as strong as they use to be. I’ve had problems with dropping things. Due to lack of strength in my hands. These are great with light tension. So I can get my hands and wrist back we’re they were.
customer_reviews.author: J Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Good for physical rehab!
customer_reviews.text: Broke my arm at the wrist, had the cast recently taken off, and I've been going to physical therapy. This pack of stuff helps between visits, and they're easy to use as you're driving, watching TV. You can adjust the amount of resistance in the hand strengthener, too. Durable material.
customer_reviews.author: Azakaia

customer_reviews.title: Cheap but still useful
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because it was cheap and had relatively good ratings. I got what I deserved. The rubber is very cheap so it is disintegrating. I think if I keep it up the whole kit will dissolve within six months- Still I get my arm and hand workout- so for the price it is worth it- But it is disintegrating- It is not strong either- Yet again, it is cheap so I am not going to complain-
customer_reviews.author: P. Kim

customer_reviews.title: Great For Musicians!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to improve my hand and forearm strength. I’m a guitarist, and having the proper strength to be able to play more complex things, and to be able to play them for longer periods, is essential to continued progress. In just a few days, this grip strengthener has improved my strength, and I’ve been able to stretch my fingers to reach notes I couldn’t comfortably reach before. It’s also helped me in practicing scales. I also play drums. I’ve noticed that I can sustain a triplet roll faster, for about a minute longer than I could as well. I’m very excited to continue to use this product, and improve my playing.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Is a good set for theray
customer_reviews.text: I ended up with some nerve damage on my right arm and Hand, specially my index finger after my ACDF. These tools are somewhat helping me recover some of the strength I lost after surgery. It is worth the price. Different pieces they all work extremely good for me, no complaints
customer_reviews.author: Big Sarge

customer_reviews.title: This kit is great , with one exception
customer_reviews.text: Everything in this kit is great except the little contraption with 5 loop/holes. It is way to tight on my fingers and cut the circulation to the end of my finger off. The round Doughnut things are great enough and were quit a surprise. I think they were actually the most effective item in the pack.
customer_reviews.author: IBgready

customer_reviews.title: Small, not for man-hands. Build quality consistent with price
customer_reviews.text: If you study the images carefully you can see that it's too small for a man's hands, and for many women's hands as well. The build quality is "ok", but you can definitely see that it is cheaply built, as befits the price. You pay for what you get, and most folks are not going to use this over the long term anyway.
customer_reviews.author: K. Andrews

customer_reviews.title: Everything you need for hand, wrist, finger strenghening
customer_reviews.text: A quality assortment of 4 exercise tools in a nifty togo bag that allows you to quickly and easily exercise both hands, wrists, fingers and forearms. Compact and sturdy enough to carry on the go or merely use them at home, your choice. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: mitchell a.

customer_reviews.title: Item Missing, Finger Stretcher Resistance Band Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: While the hand gripper and hand / finger exerciser appear to be of decent quality, I never received the Hand Strengthener Grip Ring and the Finger Stretcher Resistance Band broke within four days of use. Unacceptable. I would avoid this product.
customer_reviews.author: K. Ghurkins

customer_reviews.title: No instructions or info how to get to ebook
customer_reviews.text: I bought this rather paying $30 for plastic handgripper adjusted with rubber bands. Therapy is to improve hand strength after nerve surgery. I can see it has adjustable weight on one of the pieces but can’t see how to do so. Listed as coming with ebook but nothing but card with website and I see nothing there. I posted question, but no answer. Should have spent the $30 at therapy. 3 of the 4 pieces seem worthless.
customer_reviews.author: Dana

customer_reviews.title: Great quality product at a great price
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this purchase. High quality items. Being in quarantine I am spending more time in front of the computer than usual and needed something to help keep my hands strengthened and stretched. Been using this kit throughout my day, all day. I'm so happy with this I purchased another for when I go back to the office.
customer_reviews.author: Joe E

customer_reviews.title: Keep each of these at a different place so I can train everywhere.
customer_reviews.text: In the box it comes with 4 grip strength tools. I keep each one in a different location so i can train anywhere. I have one in my home office, work office, car, and in the livling room so i can train wherever I am. Definitely improving my grip strength. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Justin A.

customer_reviews.title: Wake-ups are easy
customer_reviews.text: I keep this by my bed and use it in the AM before I get out of bed in the morning. It helps me get and stay awake. I would say it improves my strength, but I am probably the strongest and fittest people in the world. So there is no more strength to gain for me. I have maxed out. Made of good materials.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Stafford

customer_reviews.title: It’s a bag of...meh.😐
customer_reviews.text: Nice value items for the money. Mandrillsports.com is down. So don’t bother trying to find anything like how to. Use your tools. The spring finger strength tool feels cheap. Look forward to seeing it break soon I’m sure. Really 3.5 stars, but amazon doesn’t allow it.
customer_reviews.author: MotoJunkie

customer_reviews.title: Too easy
customer_reviews.text: One starring this because I lost my fitbeast set and I figured I'd try this set out. I've only used the knuckle squeezing one so far, but the resistance of it is far lighter than fitbeast. This is great if you wanna start out or need a quick hand workout, but I need something with stronger resistance, this is to easy. Guess I'll order another Fitbeast
customer_reviews.author: Ainaxos

customer_reviews.title: Great value of the money
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, for the price that I paid, I thought I was going to get some cheap little toys... But these are surprisingly well constructed. I'm trying to quit biting my fingernails while working at my office desk... When I get the urge, I just reach for one of this 4 little devices to keep my hands busy...
customer_reviews.author: R.Barbetta

customer_reviews.title: Helps with arm pump
customer_reviews.text: The hand squeezey thing works well. Im using it to help with the arm pump I get while racing moto enduros. The individual finger exercise thing would work better if the palm piece also didn't push in while you try to isolate finger exercises. The rubber finger spreader is just that. Works fine
customer_reviews.author: Fat bike Matt

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: For the price I am happy with what I get. It all seems to be good quality products and is basically everything in my mind you need to get started in hand and grip strength. As for durability I won't know for a while if these hold up.
customer_reviews.author: Oscar Torres

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for the price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in quarantine to keep up my grip strength for bouldering. The plastic feels kinda cheap but they're surprisingly holding up to frequent use and they're pretty good. If you're a seasoned powerlifter though, it might not be enough resistance for you.
customer_reviews.author: HMC

customer_reviews.title: Worth a buy!!
customer_reviews.text: Very useful for strengthening your forearms and fingers. With lot of staying at home and working on phones, laptops, computers you are kind of stressing your hands as well:) I tried all the items within this product and liked them all.
customer_reviews.author: sanjurulz

customer_reviews.title: Okay for the money
customer_reviews.text: Good for the price but the brand name stuff that it replaces is better. The individual finger strengthener has really weak springs. Not doing much. The overall adjustable grip strengthener works well. The rubber donut and finger stretcher are just okay.
customer_reviews.author: Clint Smith

customer_reviews.title: Amazing value for the price
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these to increase my grip strength as I do a lot of pull-ups and other tedious grip requiring activities and it has dramatically helped. So far I've been using them for about a month and I haven't noticed any reducing function or wear
customer_reviews.author: IG Twistedexposure

customer_reviews.title: Don't bother
customer_reviews.text: I dislike the finger exerciser and the hand grippers. It says for big hands but these are too small for my hands and I don't have very big hands. The material they use rubs on your hands and makes blisters after 2 min of use. The products also feel very cheap. Order a different brand
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Helping the needy hand
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my friend who has a form of Parkinsons' disease and within 2 days he had improved his hand strength and lost the pain in one of the two fingers he had pain in. Just like everything else you have to use it daily but this seems perfect for him.
customer_reviews.author: pburns

customer_reviews.title: Best product for regaining hand strength!!
customer_reviews.text: I am using these products for my dad to regain his strength after his stroke. These hand grips are easy to use, they are definitely durable and are working wonders. They don't put much strain on the fingers or hands so he is quite comfortable using them. I would definitely recommend this product for anyone who has RA very much like myself or who needs them for therapeutic reasons!!
customer_reviews.author: Maria L. Mancino

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality. Light weight. Prefer more ressistance.
customer_reviews.text: Nice inexpensive set. The donut ring has little of noe use to me. The finger grip with springs is to soft. I should have purchased the gripper and the finger compression separately with a greater resistance level for the finger compression. The advertisement does inform the Buyer as to compression level.
customer_reviews.author: DocTin

customer_reviews.title: Lots of stuff, good storage
customer_reviews.text: So I really bought this for the hand gripper. The rest I mostly don't care about but - I do love the hand gripper. It's comfortable and lets me do as little or as much as I want. The rest of the equipment is OK and definitely is a good entry product for someone wanting to work on their hands more than I do.
customer_reviews.author: Brian H.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Fabulous for 54 female with reduced strength in hands. Right away you feel hands get stronger. Just watch tv and play with grippers. Getting one for my son who has ot issues with hands also.
customer_reviews.author: MomsView-com

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic value - great for a motorcycle
customer_reviews.text: Every piece of this is really good! The spring "finger strength" unit is a little easy, but the large handle unit is perfect for developing strength for a motorcycle (the clutch and front brake). The small finger-spreader is really good too, as is the small round squeezing tool. All in all this is a fantastic value.
customer_reviews.author: Cavediver

customer_reviews.title: Great for exercise and fidget!
customer_reviews.text: These are great for exercising your hands as well as fidgeting. I have a hair-pulling disorder and this is one of the few things that work for my hands. The weight you are squeezing is adjustable and all of them are light weight.
customer_reviews.author: Alysonpilat

customer_reviews.title: Great for arthritis therapy.
customer_reviews.text: The doughnut ring works miracles with my arthritic hand. I spend about 5 minutes a day squeezing the rubber doughnut and it enables me to comfortably grip my tools and i can now also clench my hand into a fist without feeling a lot of pain. I don't like this product, I LOVE IT!!!
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: The hand gripper works well. I particularly like the adjustable grip strength. The donut works like a nice stress ball. I haven't used the other two items, but they look about the same quality as the other two.
customer_reviews.author: Jose

customer_reviews.title: Good variety,well made
customer_reviews.text: These tools are well made and appear durable. I guess if I ever break one then my hands will have gotten REALLY strong, lol. On a serious note there is a good variety of tools to use to strengthen different parts of the hand & even the forearm. Definitely helpful for musicians. For the price I consider this an excellent value.
customer_reviews.author: Bevan McCloud

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for something while I am at my desk all day to help fidget and strengthen my hands and arms. This was just perfect. Super easy to adjust as needed and seems to be working. Hope this helps.
customer_reviews.author: zachus

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these after finishing physical therapy. I was diagnosed with a herniated disc in my neck, causing pain in my arms and my hands cramping and carpal tunnel in both hands. I was given exercises to do but needed these to continue my therapy for carpal tunnel but needed these to build strengths in my hands. I recommend these to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Jo Simms

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality Product and Unresponsive Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: Recently purchased 2 pairs, one for home office and one for work office. Both of the sets are peeling and shedding black chunks of rubber all over my desks. I reached out to the customer service team, to see if we could resolve the issue, not once, but twice. That was 5 days ago, still no response. Don't waste your money on these. Opt for something that has a decent standard of Quality Control and a Customer Service department that cares about their customers.
customer_reviews.author: TONY

customer_reviews.title: My son is very satsified so far
customer_reviews.text: Just arrived today. My son is thrilled. Made me try out the hand squeezer thingy...of course I could barely squeeze it, but he made it seem easy. LOL Anyway, so far so good. Thanks.!
customer_reviews.author: Texas Gal

customer_reviews.title: for myself
customer_reviews.text: I am female.. but I wanted to have more strength in my grip.. and it has seem to help.. I used mine when I sit and read.. not looking to be a competition weight lifter just need a better grip.. And all of the items worked well.
customer_reviews.author: Jinny12

customer_reviews.title: Most of it is awesome.
customer_reviews.text: Only four out of five because one of the pieces is basically useless. The plastic one with the palm, and individual finger workers is pretty weak. Also the large rubber ring is pretty basic and you can out grow it quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This gripper is amazing! I’m looking to strengthen my grip and hand after pregnancy carpal tunnel. I’ve only had it for a couple days but I can already see an improvement in my strength! It’s going to help me when I can workout again. I would absolutely recommend this product to anyone looking to improve their grip strength!
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra Boyer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Delivery came on time. Everything, as presented, was received. I love this set because it gives you different options to train your forearms are wrist. I've used all the items and this is a quality, especially for the price. I would definitely recommend.I'll update if I can remember on any gains and if this product does give the gains I'm looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Versitile comprehensive Hand and Grip Exercisers
customer_reviews.text: This set of 4 exercisers offers a wide range of hand/grip/finger exercise.Each is comfortable to hold, unlike some other similar exercisers made of hard plastic. The storage bag is very helpful and conveniently keeps the 4 units together. I would buy for family and friends wanting to maintain or improve hand or grip strength.
customer_reviews.author: J. Edward

customer_reviews.title: Cheap rubber grips fall apart after a few uses
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use but after only a few uses the rubber is coming off and my hands are full of black chunks
customer_reviews.author: K Soze

customer_reviews.title: good for exercising and hand rehab.
customer_reviews.text: I'm rehabbing from hand surgery, and this will do the trick. The fact that there are different devices in the kit, even if some of them duplicate the actions I need, means that it won't be as tedius as rehab often is. No complaints. Shipped fast, and price is very reasonable.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory A Mead

customer_reviews.title: Good product. Good price.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as weightlifting has made my hands start to wear down and get weaker. Also, pain in my wrists. Heard to try working them out using these type of exercises. Use them at night in bed for about 5 min a night. Seems to be helping.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great hand strengthener
customer_reviews.text: Used this to help with my climbing needs. So far all items included have held up nicely and have nice features (Hand Gripper has adjustment dial). Have already recommended this to my climbing friends.
customer_reviews.author: P. S

customer_reviews.title: Helping my carpel tunnel
customer_reviews.text: Product is excellent. Everything that is advertised is in fact what it says it is. The individual pieces are sturdy, and the bag they cone in is really beautiful. Best grip I’ve owned, and I’ve had three others that broke/snapped. I wish I could say that I was that strong to break them. This grip is harder than any of the other ones I’ve had. Finally products that are true to what they say. GO BOBO. Thank you!!
customer_reviews.author: jiveman

customer_reviews.title: It looks like what I want
customer_reviews.text: I think a couple of the exercises in the directions hard to do with the equipment but overall everything does what they are designed to do and exercise the specific muscle groups that needed attention. I am happy with the products and price - good value for the cost. I cannot speak to durability. I have only had the kit for a week.
customer_reviews.author: DGE

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Value
customer_reviews.text: I’ve only had this a few days but am surprised at the quality for the value. I’m strengthening my hands to combat some desk fatigue and stiffness I’ve been experiencing and this set is great. The individual finger exerciser isn’t adjustable so if you’re buying it for that, I’d recommend going with a product specifically for that, but it’s still great and the hand grip is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: ChiTown Alli

customer_reviews.title: Good for price
customer_reviews.text: The rubber finger extender thing snapped after a few months, maybe I used it too much. The gripper is holding up still, and adjusts well, though the knob falls off a lot. The big Oring will last forever im sure. The other individual finger compress thing works alright I guess.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Hand Grip Strengthener (4 Pack) with Forearm Exerciser Adjustable Resistance Hand Gripper, Finger Stretcher, Grip Ring and Finger Exerciser for Men and Women, Injury Recovery and Muscle Builder
product_meta.description:
Mandrill Hand Strengthener Forearm Grip Workout Kit 4-in-1 + Carry bag + eBook + 3 years warranty

Mandrill Team created the 4-in-1 complete Grip Strength Trainer Kit to help strengthen and exercise the hands, fingers, wrist, forearm, elbow, recover or improve performance. 

Why choose our Mandrill 4-in-1 Complete Hand Strengthener Kit? 
♥ Mandrill Team developed the most effective and comprehensive hand workout/grip strength trainer kit that satisfies all your needs.
♥ Mandrill grip strengthener helps you increase the performance and gain strength
♥ Our products will help you improve finger strength and dexterity, perfect for athletes, musicians or fitness.
♥ Great for rehabilitation, recovery and stress relief. Beneficial for people who have arthritis, tennis elbow, rheumatoid arthritis and carpal tunnel or hand, shoulder, finger surgery. 
♥ Using our product will help you reduce joint pains, stiffness, release daily stress and increase blood circulation.

What's included in Mandrill Forearm Grip Workout Hand Grip Strengthener kit?
✔ 1 x Adjustable Hand Exerciser Grip Strengthener trainer (22-88 Lbs)
✔ 1 x Finger Exerciser (4 Lbs for each finger)
✔ 1 x Grip Strength Trainer Ring (4 Lbs resistance)
✔ 1 x Finger Stretcher Resistance Band (medium resistance)
✔ 1 x High Quality Carry Bag
✔ 1 x How to Ebook
✔ 10 years warranty

♥ Because customer satisfaction is the highest priority we offer 10 YEARS WARRANTY.
If you are not 100% satisfied with your hand grip strengthener kit, we will happily refund in full. 

"The products we create demands to be the best in his category, that's why we have created MANDRILL Brand, to bring quality into everyone's life. We created MANDRILL so you can LEARN TRAIN WIN" - BOBO, Founder
feature_bullets: Advanced Hand Grip Strengthener – Each hand strengthener forearm grip workout set includes an adjustable grip strength trainer, finger strengthener, finger stretcher, and exercise ring to add more diversity to your forearm exerciser.

Multipurpose Personal Use – Mandrill Grip Strength Trainer can help improve grip strength, finger flexibility, wrist stability or overall forearm power, making them a good choice for athletes, piano or guitar players, drummers and musicians, bodybuilders, and more.

Relieve Pain, Improve Circulation – Offering pre- and post-workout recovery these hand exerciser grip strengthener tools offer occupational therapy for carpal tunnel due to computer use, rheumatoid arthritis, joint pain and stiffness, or tendonitis.

Ergonomic, Travel-Ready Support – Mandrill Hand exerciser grip strengthener is for both men and women with different hand sizes, our hand grip strengthener exerciser and tools come with a convenient storage bag that you can take anywhere, stick in a gym bag, or use during an office meeting. Mandrill Grip Strength Trainer can be used anywhere at any time.

Exercise eBook and 3 Year Warranty – Here at Mandrill we take pride in the long-lasting quality and durability of our forearm grip workout equipment, which is why each one is backed by a 3-year warranty and replace or refund guarantee to ensure your total happiness.
